title: LF Players to join social rankd 5 team, bronze/silver welcome and have fun.
body: Just add me in game, Ljgreis. Ready to play now, or leave comment with name.

replies.body: nightang3l (nightang3L) add me, looking for a fun ranked team to play with, support main btw
I'm certainly, I have just added you on LoL however I might not be on as much over the next 2 weeks because my finals are on.
I wouldn't mind but i'd like to regain my throne in Solo Q first :P
